name: part_003
file: tmp_【ラミィ生誕記念2022】今年も好き放題やります！100万円晩酌【 #やかまし100万円飲み会 ⧸ホロライブ】 [hzmimWcN34Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Lamy, Korone, Noel, and Marine discuss the plan for the 1 million yen drinking party, mentioning sake for the first half and wine for the second.
Hakui Koyori joins as a guest. The group cheers and Lamy introduces the start of the sake section.
A-chan (narrator) introduces the first sake, 'Reikyo -Absolute 0-', and explains its extreme 0.85% rice polishing ratio.
The price of the sake is revealed to be 385,000 yen, shocking everyone. They then have a toast.
The members taste the expensive sake, reacting to its intense aroma and surprisingly smooth flavor.
Noel mentions being hungry, leading to the introduction of the first snack, Karasumi (mullet roe), and a discussion about its origins.

subtitles.original: 日本酒が前半戦で...
subtitles.english: Sake is for the first half...

subtitles.original: ええ。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: 後半戦が、えーと、ワインを用意しております。
subtitles.english: And for the second half, well, we have wine ready.

subtitles.original: おお〜！ワイン！
subtitles.english: Ohh! Wine!

subtitles.original: ということで、まず日本酒ということなんですけれども...
subtitles.english: So, we're starting off with the sake section, but...

subtitles.original: 日本酒といえば!?
subtitles.english: Speaking of sake!?

subtitles.original: ここで...
subtitles.english: At this point...

subtitles.original: ゲストを用意しております！
subtitles.english: We have a guest ready!

subtitles.original: 日本酒といえば、日本酒といえば！
subtitles.english: Speaking of sake, speaking of sake!

subtitles.original: こんこよ〜！こんこよ〜！
subtitles.english: Konkoyo! Konkoyo!

subtitles.original: ※博衣こより
subtitles.english: *Hakui Koyori

subtitles.original: ハローハロー！
subtitles.english: Hello, hello!

subtitles.original: おめでとうございま〜す！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 日本酒 飲めるんすかぁ〜！？
subtitles.english: Can you drink sake!?

subtitles.original: 日本酒飲めますよ、100万円分のね！！
subtitles.english: I can drink sake, especially 1 million yen worth!

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、面白い日本酒を色々用意したんで...
subtitles.english: I've prepared several interesting sakes...

subtitles.original: 紹介していきたいと思います！はい！
subtitles.english: So I'd like to introduce them! Yes!

subtitles.original: えーちゃん、よろしくお願いします！！
subtitles.english: A-chan, please take it away!

subtitles.original: はい、商品の紹介は私、ホロライブスタッフ友人Aが行います。
subtitles.english: Yes, I, Hololive staff member Friend A, will introduce the items.

subtitles.original: やかまし100万円飲み会、最初のお酒は『零響 -Absolute 0-』。
subtitles.english: For the Noisy 1 Million Yen Drinking Party, the first sake is 'Reikyo -Absolute 0-'.

subtitles.original: 精米歩合50%以下の日本酒は何という？
subtitles.english: Do you know what sake with a rice polishing ratio of 50% or less is called?

subtitles.original: え、何て呼ばれるんですか？
subtitles.english: Eh, what is it called?

subtitles.original: 大、大、大吟醸！あ、大吟醸！
subtitles.english: Da-, Da-, Daiginjo! Ah, Daiginjo!

subtitles.original: 聞いたことある〜！
subtitles.english: I've heard of that!

subtitles.original: 大吟醸＝高級酒に位置づけられるんですよ。
subtitles.english: It's classified as Daiginjo, a high-end sake.

subtitles.original: なんとこの『零響』、精米歩合が0.85%。
subtitles.english: Amazingly, this 'Reikyo' has a rice polishing ratio of 0.85%.

subtitles.original: え〜！ほぼ、ほぼない！！
subtitles.english: Eh! Almost, almost nothing left!!

subtitles.original: お米全体の99.15%を削って、残り0.85%のみを使用して造られたお酒。
subtitles.english: It's sake brewed using only the remaining 0.85% after polishing away 99.15% of the rice grain.

subtitles.original: もうキンキンに研ぎ澄まされた部分だけで...
subtitles.english: Only using the most intensely refined part...

subtitles.original: スゲー！
subtitles.english: Amazing!

subtitles.original: お米の真ん中の真ん中の真ん中の真ん中だけなの！
subtitles.english: It's just the very, very, very center of the rice!

subtitles.original: 見えな〜い！
subtitles.english: I can't see it!

subtitles.original: なんとあの、5297時間、221日もの時間をかけて精米。
subtitles.english: It took 5,297 hours, or 221 days, just for the polishing process.

subtitles.original: じっくりとお米を磨くそうですよ。
subtitles.english: They polish the rice very slowly and carefully.

subtitles.original: 詳しいなこいつ。
subtitles.english: He's quite knowledgeable.

subtitles.original: 匠の技ですね。
subtitles.english: It's a master's craft.

subtitles.original: メガネかけてそうだもんな。
subtitles.english: Sounds like someone who wears glasses.

subtitles.original: お値段こちら...
subtitles.english: The price is...

subtitles.original: 38万5000円！ええええ〜！？高い！
subtitles.english: 385,000 yen! Eeeee!? So expensive!

subtitles.original: 大事に、大事にお楽しみください。
subtitles.english: Please enjoy it very, very carefully.
This one, 385,000 yen...

subtitles.original: 一年分の食費くらいじゃないですか！？
subtitles.english: Isn't that like a year's worth of food expenses!?

subtitles.original: 一年...？絶妙だよな。
subtitles.english: A year...? That's a specific amount.

subtitles.original: みんな、かんぱーい！！
subtitles.english: Everyone, cheers!!

subtitles.original: 38万5000円、お楽しみください。
subtitles.english: Please enjoy the 385,000 yen.

subtitles.original: あ、なんかすごい！匂いがすご〜い！
subtitles.english: Ah, wow! The smell is amazing!

subtitles.original: ラミィ これどんな匂いですか？
subtitles.english: Lamy, what kind of smell is this?

subtitles.original: これはですね、もう削りに削り取られた、もう雑味のないッ！！
subtitles.english: This is, well, it's been polished and polished, so there's absolutely no bitterness!!

subtitles.original: 顔隠れてますよ？
subtitles.english: Your face is hidden, you know?

subtitles.original: 旨味しかない吟醸香！！
subtitles.english: A Ginjo aroma that's pure umami!!

subtitles.original: みんな生きてるうちに、もう嗅ぐことないこれ、本当に！
subtitles.english: You'll never smell this again in your lifetime, seriously!

subtitles.original: すごーい！
subtitles.english: Amazing!

subtitles.original: 飲みやすい！飲みやすい！
subtitles.english: So easy to drink! So easy to drink!

subtitles.original: え、飲んだの！？飲んだの！？
subtitles.english: Eh, you drank it!? You already drank it!?

subtitles.original: フライング？飲んだw
subtitles.english: A false start? She drank it lol.

subtitles.original: うまッ！！うまッ！！
subtitles.english: Good!! It's good!!

subtitles.original: あ、なんか... 飲みやすい！
subtitles.english: Ah, wow... It's so easy to drink!

subtitles.original: 「匂い的に無理かもしれん...」って思ったけど、美味いわ...
subtitles.english: I thought 'I might not handle the smell...', but it's delicious...

subtitles.original: 雑味のない！この精米歩合0.85%！！
subtitles.english: No bitterness! This 0.85% rice polishing ratio!!

subtitles.original: 雑味はなくてスッキリとした、でも飲みやすいの。これは素晴らしい一品ですよ。
subtitles.english: It's clear without bitterness, yet easy to drink. This is a wonderful item.

subtitles.original: な〜んか みんな足りなくないですか？
subtitles.english: Doesn't everyone feel like we're missing something?

subtitles.original: はい！おなか空いたなぁ〜
subtitles.english: Yes! I'm hungry!

subtitles.original: おなか空いたぁ〜！何か食べたいな〜！
subtitles.english: I'm hungry! I want to eat something!

subtitles.original: おつまみも力を入れております！！
subtitles.english: We've also put a lot of effort into the snacks!!

subtitles.original: おつまみも！入ってるんですか！？
subtitles.english: Snacks too! Are they included!?

subtitles.original: えーちゃん 紹介よろしくお願いします！！
subtitles.english: A-chan, please introduce them!

subtitles.original: お待たせしました、最初のおつまみは『からすみ』。
subtitles.english: Thanks for waiting, the first snack is 'Karasumi' (mullet roe).

subtitles.original: 皆さんは、からすみの原料って知ってますか？
subtitles.english: Do you all know what the ingredient for Karasumi is?

subtitles.original: からすみってさ、食べたことないんだけど、これって正体なに？
subtitles.english: I've never eaten Karasumi, but what exactly is it?

subtitles.original: スミじゃないの？イカスミじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Isn't it ink? Like squid ink?

subtitles.original: イカスミではない。
subtitles.english: It's not squid ink.

subtitles.original: 卵巣ですよね？
subtitles.english: It's the ovary, right?

subtitles.original: 誰の卵？カラスの？
subtitles.english: Whose eggs? A crow's?

subtitles.original: カラス！？鳥になっちゃったw
subtitles.english: A crow!? Now it's a bird lol.

subtitles.original: ボラの卵巣となっております。
subtitles.english: It is actually the ovary of a mullet fish.

subtitles.original: ボラって何よ？お魚じゃない？
subtitles.english: What's a mullet? Isn't it a fish?

subtitles.original: ボラ... え、こんなの腹ん中に入ってんの！？
subtitles.english: A mullet... wait, this is inside its belly!?

subtitles.original: そう、それをギュッとしてるんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Yeah, and it's probably compressed like that.

subtitles.original: タラコとかと同じってことですよね。
subtitles.english: So it's the same idea as Tarako (cod roe).

subtitles.original: はい、そしてもう一つ行きますか！
subtitles.english: Yes, and shall we go with one more!
